Package hw2

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
hw2.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Represents a customer who can make reservations and manage their balance. Customers can add funds, add reservations to their basket, remove reservations from their basket, and check out their reservations. Customers have a name, a balance, and a basket to hold their reservations.
Since:
13/03/2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Panagiotis Tsembekis

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(String name, int balance)
      Constructs a Customer with the specified name and initial balance.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the customer.
      balance - The initial balance of the customer in cents.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the customer.
      Returns:
      The name of the customer.

    • getBalance

      public int getBalance()
      Retrieves the balance of the customer.
      Returns:
      The balance of the customer in cents.

    • getBasket

      public Basket getBasket()
      Retrieves the basket of reservations associated with the customer.
      Returns:
      The basket containing the customer's reservations.

    • addFunds

      public int addFunds(int amount)
      Adds funds to the customer's balance.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of funds to add to the balance in cents.
      Returns:
      The new balance after adding funds.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the amount of funds is negative.

    • addToBasket

      public int addToBasket(Reservation newReservation)
      Adds a reservation to the customer's basket.
      Parameters:
      newReservation - The reservation to add to the basket.
      Returns:
      The number of reservations in the basket after adding.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the reservation's name does not correspond to the customer's name.

    • addToBasket

      public int addToBasket(Hotel hotel, String roomType, int numOfNights, boolean includeBreakfast)
      Adds a hotel or bnb reservation to the customer's basket.
      Parameters:
      hotel - The hotel where the reservation is made.
      roomType - The type of room reserved.
      numOfNights - The number of nights for the reservation.
      includeBreakfast - Whether breakfast is included in the reservation.
      Returns:
      The number of reservations in the basket after adding.

    • addToBasket

      public int addToBasket(Airport departure, Airport arrival)
      Adds a flight reservation to the customer's basket.
      Parameters:
      departure - The airport of departure.
      arrival - The airport of arrival.
      Returns:
      The number of reservations in the basket after adding.

    • removeFromBasket

      public boolean removeFromBasket(Reservation res)
      Removes a reservation from the customer's basket.
      Parameters:
      res - The reservation to remove from the basket.
      Returns:
      true if the reservation was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • checkOut

      public int checkOut()
      Proceeds to check out the reservations in the customer's basket. Deducts the total cost of reservations from the customer's balance.
      Returns:
      The remaining balance after checking out.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the basket is empty or if the balance is insufficient.
